short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intelliscore uses machine learning to predict the results of football matches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses advanced machine learning algorithms to predict the outcomes of sports matches. It provides users with accurate predictions and insights for upcoming games in major football leagues such as the Premier League, Bundesliga, La Liga, Serie A, and Ligue 1. The extension is designed to help sports enthusiasts make informed decisions based on data-driven predictions.
